name: Time to survive (gamingbhai5)
description:
So guys!!!!! So this is my first game that I have made in my life. I have made this game to entertain you all. Play this game and rate this game.

So in this game there is a player who  has trapped in a zombie area and he has to survive. There are many guns and very dangerous zombies so take care!!!!

and now download the game  have fun good luck!!! 

Instructions-

System requirements-

Processor-intel core i3 4th generation   

Ram-2GB 1600mhz Speed

Graphics card-256mb video card

OS-windows7,8,8.1 and windows10

Space-500mb free hard disk space
